senses.sense_definition: Describing a substance or material that is not composed of or relating to minerals.

examples.text: The scientist analyzed the <w>nonmineral</w> components found in the soil sample.
Many <w>nonmineral</w> supplements are derived from plants rather than rocks.

senses.sense_definition: A substance or object that does not belong to the category of minerals.

examples.text: The waste material consisted mostly of plastics and other <w>nonminerals</w>.
It is important to distinguish minerals from <w>nonminerals</w> when classifying rocks.
